definitions.definition: The location where the nucellus attaches to the integuments , opposite the micropyle .
One of the two spiral bands which attach the yolk of an egg to the eggshell , suspending it in the white .

main_definition: ( botany ) The location where the nucellus attaches to the integuments , opposite the micropyle .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) One of the two spiral bands which attach the yolk of an egg to the eggshell , suspending it in the white .
